title: More than half of Department for Transport cars still diesel
description: Figures show the department in charge of the transition away from diesel still relies on the fuel.

title: Afghanistan: The escape of the whirling dancer

description: Sarina Wiegman's England tenure started with an 8-0 thrashing of North Macedonia but she still demanded more.

title: Unpaid state pension: 'I'm disgusted by delays'
description: Thousands of people who have turned 66 have not been paid their state pensions and they are furious.

title: Three Chinese astronauts return to Earth after 90 days in space
description: The three men make a safe return after 90 days in space - China's longest ever crewed mission.

title: Sickle cell: 'Did our son have to die to change things?'

title: England captain Houghton out of World Cup qualifier
description: England captain Steph Houghton is out of Friday's World Cup qualifier against North Macedonia because of an ankle injury.

title: ECB to decide on Pakistan matches 'in next 48 hours' after NZ abandon tour because of 'security alert'
description: New Zealand men's team abandon their limited-overs tour of Pakistan following a New Zealand government "security alert".

title: Long Covid: What is it and what are the symptoms?
description: Significant numbers have had long-term problems after recovering from the original infection.

title: Lil Nas X: Is the rapper the defining star of his generation?

title: Dorman Long tower to be destroyed after listed status revoked

description: Michael Gove is known as a reformer and is now in charge of controversial planning changes.

description: Sussex Sharks, Hampshire Hawks, Somerset and Kent Spitfires head to Edgbaston in a bid to be crowned T20 Blast champions.

description: Ministers are expected to announce changes to the travel traffic light system in England on Friday.
